name: Drawer

pages.text: In inventory, left click drawer with a stack to store item. Right click drawer to take item out.$(br2)Drawer can only store 1 kind of simple item that has no NBT, but can store up to 64 stacks (4096 items). Use $(l:items/8_ender_pocket)Ender Pocket$(/l) to upgrade to at most 512 stacks (32768 items).$(br2)You can put drawers inside your backpack, so that your backpack can store more items.

pages: Features:$(li)Shift + right click to place it as a block$(li)Drawer Collect: Shift + right click on non-placeable point to store matching items from inventory.$(li)Drawer Extract: Right click with drawer to take one stack item out.$(li)$(l:mechanics/chest)Load / Dump with Chest$(/l)$(li)$(l:mechanics/quick_insert)Quick Insert$(/l)$(li)$(l:mechanics/drawer_quickmove)Drawer Quick Move$(/l)$(li)$(l:mechanics/pickup)Recursive Pickup$(/l)
